Summary: mysterious light followed by fighter jets
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Eufaula
There were no other sightings in Eufaula on or around February 7th 2008
divs: sighting detailseufaula, ok. 25 miles north of mcalester, ok. next to hwy 69\75: it was just after dark (7:05pm). i was outside my place of employment waiting for my wife to pick me up, when i noticed a large bright object over the western horizon. at first glance, i assumed that it was mars, but it caught my attention because it was too big and was flashing different colors. it appeared to be motionless. i watched it for a few minutes in between looking for my wife and looking back inside the building to see what time it was(my wife was late). between about 7:10 and 7:15 the light really caught my attention because it suddenly burst into motion taking off upwards and toward the e.s.e. the light became muted and solid white. it appeared to be moving at a leisurly rate of speed. at about the time it crossed the highway, it suddenly shifted to a red color. i watched it for a few more seconds, and then i glanced around to see if there was anyone else around that i could get to verify what i was seeing. everyone else was inside the building, so i looked back up at the object and it was just suddenly gone, like instantly. i was still waiting on my ride and scanning the sky for another glimpse, when about 5 minutes after the object dissappeared, the sky suddenly filled up with about half a dozen fast moving aircraft. two were flying in loose formation from w to e and there were one or two more under them going e to w. my impression was that they were searching for the thing i had seen. after a couple more minutes, another jet came hauling ass out of the south with afterburners screaming and shot off towards the north. after that, everything quieted down and my wife finally showed up. the whole thing lasted about 20 minutes.
